name: Wiki-ML-Selected
description: This contains curated knowledge on numerous topics in machine learning, deep learning, and related fields, sourced from Wikipedia pages. It serves as a specialized repository for both foundational and advanced concepts.

name: Tools-Python
description: This contains an introduction and short description of various Python based machine learning and deep learning libraries and frameworks.

name: Tools-C-CPP
description: This contains an introduction and short description of various C/C++ based  machine learning and deep learning libraries and frameworks.

name: Datasets-ML
description: This is a curated repository containing comprehensive metadata for a wide range of datasets—from classic machine learning collections datasets to extensive resources on modern deep learning. This specifically serves as a dedicated index for dataset-related information.

name: Huggingface-documentations
description: This is a curated repository of comprehensive Hugging Face documentation, including detailed resources for the Transformers, Diffusers, PEFT, optimum, TRL (Transformer Reinforcement Learning), Evaluate, Smolagents, and Accelerate libraries. It aggregates explanation of scientific concept about various algorithms and methods in deep learning, installation guides, tutorials, API references, optimization techniques, and developer insights, ensuring that every aspect of these libraries and the methods behind them is covered.

name: Loss-Functions
description: This is a curated collection of documentation references for a wide range of machine learning loss functions, including variants such as Mean Squared Error, Mean Absolute Error, Crossentropy, Huber, and many more.

name: BlogPosts-Towardai
description: This vector store is a dedicated repository of curated machine learning and artificial intelligence resources, featuring a diverse collection of technical articles, research insights, and practical guides sourced from Towards AI. It includes detailed entries on topics ranging from deploying models and custom implementations to in-depth analyses of algorithms and advanced concepts in retrieval augmentation generation (RAG) systems.
